Name: Lack of Water
About the game: Lack of water is a puzzle game. You need to direct the flow of water towards an empty glass. Draw lines and shapes to fill the glass with enough water and the level will be passed. Use physics and ingenuity. The game features 100 levels with increasing difficulty. Good game. Peculiarities: * Drawing with the mouse * 100 Levels * Funny cute cup
